Utils

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils.DataManager

  • public final class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for BOM data management.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • loadStates

        public static States loadStates()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Loads list of states with station URLs from locally stored json file.
        Returns:
        states loaded from file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an IO error of any sort

      • getStationData

        public static StationData getStationData(Station station)
        Tries to load station data from various sources. First it tries to load the most recent data from the web. If it fails it will try to load a locally cached version. If this fails, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        station - the station for which to load data
        Returns:
        loaded station data

      • getNetStationData

        public static StationData getNetStationData(Station station)
                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            JSONException
        Loads the most recent data from the web. If it fails null is returned.
        Parameters:
        station - the station for which to load data
        Returns:
        loaded station data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        JSONException

      • getCachedStationData

        public static StationData getCachedStationData(Station station)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               JSONException
        Loads the cached version of station data locally. If it fails null is returned.
        Parameters:
        station - the station for which to load data
        Returns:
        loaded station data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        JSONException

      • toDateTime

        public static LocalDateTime toDateTime(java.lang.String bomDt)
        Convert BOM formatted date time to a form recognized by joda time.
        Parameters:
        bomDt - datetime string from BOM
        Returns:
        datetime object of BOM date
